channel.title: New to rsc dev, please help.,
channel.description:
Hi, im starting to build off of the easyRSC base serverside. I'm not too great at clientside work so if anyone could help me out with this thatd be great.
RSCDaemon V25, i dont get why its ANY better the basic client. I'd like to know if anyone has a Big client version of rsc, or a client that has the original sprites ( Loading screens, welcome screen etc ) From runescape classic itself. i have a client that TX uploaded over on. .. another website and i like it alot just it wont work with easyrsc.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 10:44:54 pm[/size][hr]Attached is the client, it has a nice screen that asks port ip etc etc. Love it personally. but i cant figure out how to get it to work on easyRSC etc..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 10:46:59 pm[/size][hr]Sorry, on this version of what i uploaded the ip address is incorrect. but still when changed to
server=127.0.0.1 port=43594
it still doesnt wokr[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 11:01:38 pm[/size][hr]In english, i just want basically an original runescape client with a settings.ini. Not no RSCDAEMON v25 etc bullcrap. The loading + login need to be like old RSC please

item.title: New to rsc dev, please help.,
item.dc:creator: @vizi0n vizi0n
item.description:
@vizi0n wrote:

Yea ive done pretty much all tutorials. i’ve got to change the background of the loading screen but not the login. i tried to edit sprite 3150 and still no cigar. I like the client that he uploaded because look at it, it has preset servers + server ip right on login[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 09:31:03 pm[/size][hr]Still looking for a nice client that has editable server info from login page and NOT settings.ini

ALSO! wheres the color fo the buttons etc in the login ?

Read full topic
item.source: New to rsc dev, please help.,

item.title: New to rsc dev, please help.,
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

To be honest I hate my self for reading this crap!

Search for a sprite editor and a Tutorial for it, its here somewhere!
And accepted something from T_X really meens you new, hes hated from all over the world cuz of hes botnets.
The easyrsc client is very rsc like in sprites thats why im sending you to a sprite Tutorial. the login picture maby Mr Yong can help you out with.

Search befor you post is a rule on moparscape, there are planty tutorials here some of them are sticki in the server and client help section.

Read full topic
item.source: New to rsc dev, please help.,

item.title: New to rsc dev, please help.,
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

2 things;

  1. dont attempt to try rsc private servers
  2. read tutorials before you post

Read full topic
